embed.title: Queen Seondeok
embed.description: A burst hero who allows friendly units to deal massive damage in the battle opening and heals friendly units during the battle.

fields.name: Active Skill: Holy Light Blessing
fields.value:
• Queen Seondeok’s <Holy Light Blessing> skill will recover health of all allied units (troops and heroes). The skill lasts for 6 seconds, during which time Queen Seondeok is immune to all control effects.
• Range: entire field

fields.name: Passive Skill: Radiant Power
fields.value:
• At the start of the battle, Queen Seondeok will enable allied units (troops and heroes) to deal additional damage equivalent to 5% of the allied units’ max life.
• The additional damage apply to basic attacks only (not skill effects).
• Melee allied units who do not have AoE basic attacks will also gain a small AoE effect during this time.
• Duration: 5/5.2/5.4/5.6/5.8/6/6.2/6.4/6.6/6.8/7/7.2/7.4/7.7/8 seconds

fields.name: Legendary Skill: Holy Strike
fields.value:
• When using her active skill, awakened Queen Seondeok will also trigger the <Holy Strike> skill.
• <Holy Strike> enables allied units (troops and heroes) to deal increased damage.
• The additional damage apply to **both** basic attacks and skill effects.
• Damage increase: 4% / 8% / 12% / 16% / 20%

fields.name: Arena Troops
fields.value:
• Magic Apprentice, Undead Soldier, Ballista
• Priest Mage, Peltasts, Taurus Witchers, Nun, Pirate Ship
• Witchcraft Totem, Rhino Knight, Stone Golem

footer.text: Use `{PREFIX}+seondeok [hero level] <troops name> [troops level]` to see the effect of Seondeok's skill on troops.
